Explanation

The goal of this deck is to control the boarde with exil, why exil ? Because Kaya.

Kaya's abilities does loose 1 life point to an opponent and you gain that much life point for each cards in exil of that player for her -5.

She can add cards in exil with her +1, but it take only cards in graveyard. Exept front of Golgarie it's not so strong.

So, if you exil permanent on board you keep control.

As you see, no creature in that deck because you surely use clean-board. To optimise them, many card are add to keep your life point safety front of aggro deck like boros or selesnya token aggro.

The second way to win, is to optimise your life point and use "Portal of Azor" and "Banefire" to one-shoot your opponent, usefull front of Blue/Red build.
